extension.description: View photos from http://500px.com. In the addon settings you can change what photo group (feature) you want to pull from. The values are Popular (default), Upcoming, Editors' Choice, Fresh Today, Fresh Yesterday, and Fresh This Week. You can also change the quantity of photos to view 20 (default), 40, 60, 80, 100. This addon was created by Patrick L Archibald at http://pla1.net. The source for this addon can be found at https://github.com/pla1/plugin.image.500px.
